      static java.util.function.Function<javax.swing.JComponent,javax.swing.JComponent> CWBB_PROVIDER
      Convenient error/warning outline provider for ComponentWithBrowseButton ComponentWithBrowseButton isn't a ErrorBorderCapable component so it needs a special provider.

    • Field Detail

      • CWBB_PROVIDER

        public static final java.util.function.Function<javax.swing.JComponent,javax.swing.JComponent> CWBB_PROVIDER
        Convenient error/warning outline provider for ComponentWithBrowseButton ComponentWithBrowseButton isn't a ErrorBorderCapable component so it needs a special provider. Suitable for ComponentWithBrowseButton and it's descendants.
